snippet: The former Romanian prime minister, Adrian Nastase, will be released early from prison after serving nine months of a two-year term for corruption.
abstract: Romanian court rules that former Prime Min Adrian Nastase will be released early from prison after serving nine months of two-year term for corruption.
lead_paragraph: The former Romanian prime minister, Adrian Nastase, will be released early from prison after serving nine months of a two-year term for corruption.

headline.seo: Former Romanian Premier, Adrian Nastase, to Be Released From Prison
headline.main: Former Romanian Premier Ordered Released From Prison
